message.body: Yo man, did you see that short documentary about Scott hall by espn?
Dude i have been going back and forth from being super bummed to doing razor promos on everyone i had no clue he killed a guy though
Haha I know that story was crazy
That was the 2nd best part behind "hey shawn? Your heart still beatin?"
Hahaha. I wonder how massive the "sending ex-employees to rehab" part of WWE's budget is
Haha. The Fall River, MA footage is pretty heartbreaking.
Oh dude yeah that was pretty tough to watch.. i felt bad when justin credible was like that is the most embarrassing thing ive ever been a part of oh
well thats what happens when youre 52 and still real carny
Yo dude sorry i missed your call i was setting up some speakers see u soon
